channel.title: NBA MVP on Marko Jerkovic's Gitbub Site
channel.description: Recent content in NBA MVP on Marko Jerkovic's Gitbub Site

item.title: Who Should Be the 2021 NBA MVP?
item.description: The race for the 2021 NBA MVP is one of the most contentious and complex in recent history with no clear frontrunners and a multitude of prospects. Doing some data analysis and tough decision making I’ll come to a conclusion and maybe you will come to the same one. Let’s get started by deciding our shortlist of players we’ll be looking at. This is where things can start to get contentious.
